text: Hey Julian Purser! The steps to change the staging site domain to the company domain when pointing it to HubSpot include  1. Connecting the company domain to HubSpot, 2. Changing the primary domain for HubSpot content, 3. Changing the redirect domain, and 4. Migrating the website to HubSpot CMS.
Hey Ankit, thank you for this. Iâ€™ve already got our site in the CMS against a system domain so would I only need to do steps 1-3?
